task_description.task: Put small lightweight toys onto the plate and metallic or heavy non-toy items into the shoe_box.
action: Pick green_block and place it on plate
Pick pink_block and place it on plate
Pick can and place it on plate (wrong)
Pick can from plate and place it into shoe_box (recovery)
Pick dumbbell and place it into shoe_box

task_description.task: Place utensils and drinkware intended for serving onto the tray, and personal-care liquid containers into the dustbin.
action: Pick shampoo and place it onto tray (wrong)
Pick shampoo from tray and place it into dustbin (recovery)
Pick mug and place it onto tray
Pick fork and place it onto tray
Pick knife and place it onto tray

task_description.task: Put items that produce or capture sound into the fluted_block and leave visual or reading items on the table.
action: Pick book and place it into fluted_block (wrong)
Pick book from fluted_block and place it on the table (recovery)
Pick bell and place it into fluted_block
Pick microphone and place it into fluted_block
Pick sand-clock and place it on the table
